text:
Radio Broadcasting Station
WSUI
THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF IOWA
IOWA CITY
October 20, 1944
Mr. W. I. Griffith
Radio Station WOI
Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Mr. Griffiths
This will thank you for your kindness in sending me material to be
used at our NAEB appearance before the FCC. You may be interested in the
presentation which was checked by our attorney, Horace Lohnes, and I am sending
you a copy in its final form. According to Mr. Lohnes, this presentation was
quite effective and in his opinion the educational interests stand a good
chance of being assigned 15 FM channels. Hope to see you in Chicago next
week, where I will report in detail regarding the hearing.
Yours very truly.
Carl H. Menzer
Director
CHMjJM
Enel*
